Hello! üëã

I'm Garrett Bland, a full stack web developer with Eagle Radio in Hays, Kansas. I manage our local news sites, as well as create client websites. I develop heavily in Javascript & Node, with an emphasis on React.

I'm an inspiring entreprenuer and love jumping into new things and learning. I've created a handful of projects, working on a few new ones, and write about development from time to time.

üõ† What is this site made with?

This site is being developed using 11ty and is hosted on Netlify. For the design I am using Tailwind CSS. The javascript used on this site is the amazing Alpine JS.

I write my blog posts & projects using Netlify CMS and store everything in github.
